pr_title: Fix stage duration on stage overview

timeline.bodyText: Instead of created_time can we use scheduled_at(used in dashboard api) or scheduled_date(used in pipeline instance api)?
timeline.author: kritika-singh3

timeline.message:
Bumped up Stage Instances API to v3 #8681

* v3 of the API adds attributes 'created_time' and 'last_transition_time'
* Deprecated v2 of the API

Stage overview calculate duration based on stage created and last transition time #8681

* Stage duration is calculated based on stage created time and last
  transitioned time now returned as part of the Stages API.
